name: sTunnel
Perc_SUCC: You notice skeletons covered in a thick layer of moss and a ooze motionless, barely indistinguishable from the wet rocks that make up the stream's floor.
Perc_FAIL: You don't see anything of value
Surv_FAIL: No use for this right now
Arc_FAIL: You don't sense any specific magic
roomDesc: A stream covers this tunnel's floor, rushing southward. A smaller, dry tunnel branches off from the main flooded tunnel. The skeletal remains of a humanoid can be spotted near the entrance.
